data.prayer: Father, we agree with your desire that the people in the state of Chanthaburi hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chanthaburi, Thailand
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, please raise up prophets in Chanthaburi who can call the church to holiness and purity, preparing your church as a bride for your Son.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Lord, let it be said of the 544,358 lost in Chanthaburi that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Chanthaburi, Thailand.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Father, I pray that the Dawei, Tavoyan people will not be afraid or ashamed. Prevent them from being confounded or disappointed in their search for you. May the Dawei, Tavoyan people know you.
Spirit, help every believer in Chanthaburi, Thailand be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks them for the reason for their hope.
data.verse: But in your hearts revere Christ as Lord. Always be prepared to give an answer to everyone who asks you to give the reason for the hope that you have. But do this with gentleness and respect.

data.prayer: Jesus, like with the centurion who came to you for his sick servant, please call into your house those who have great faith but are not yet yours in the state of Chanthaburi
data.verse: When Jesus heard these things, he marveled at him, and turning to the crowd that followed him, said, “I tell you, not even in Israel have I found such faith.” And when those who had been sent returned to the house, they found the servant well.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chanthaburi, Thailand has a population of 547,900.

We estimate Chanthaburi has 3,543 people who might know Jesus, 3,617 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 540,741 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 154 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, for those with enemies and who are afraid in Chanthaburi, call them into your shelter and safety today.
data.verse: For you have been a refuge for me, a strong tower from the enemy.
